title: Ranked reward borders
body:
Hello.

At the beginning of S6 I asked  support to remove my border.
So the question is did they disable it  completely or removed only during this season?

I'd actually like to have the border reward next season...

replies.body:
The border that displays during a season will be what you placed last season. This means you'll receive a new ranked border for this next season for the tier you reached this Season (S6). 

Let me know if you have any other questions.

This is still quite confusing. What I meant it that during S6 I didn't have the border from S5 as I asked support to remove it. 
I understand how it all works and the only thing I'm still not sure about is whether I'm going to have the border next season.
